definition: covered all over with cuts and bruises/beaten black and blue/be a mass of bruises
lit. one scale and half a claw (idiom); only odd bits and pieces
Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)
cuts and bruises like fish scales/terribly cut up
lit. a dragon's scale from the east and a dragon's claw from the west/odds and ends (idiom)
see 大鱗大麻哈魚|大鳞大麻哈鱼[da4 lin2 da2 ma2 ha3 yu2]
pinyin: da4 lin2 da2 ma3 ha3 yu2
da4 lin2 da2 ma2 ha3 yu2

definition: (bird species of China) pygmy wren-babbler (Pnoepyga pusilla)
(bird species of China) streak-throated woodpecker (Picus xanthopygaeus)
pinyin: lin2 hou2 lu:4 zhuo2 mu4 niao3

sentences.english: This is my advice. Give a glittering scale to each of the other fish.
sentences.chinese: 我建議你把你的閃光鱗，分給每條魚一片。

sentences.english: I was regaled with the scaly tips of the drumsticks of the fowls.
sentences.chinese: 給我喫的全是帶着鱗皮的雞爪子。

sentences.english: Scrape off scales of live croaker, dig a net viscera and gills, wash.
sentences.chinese: 將活黃花魚颳去鱗，掏淨內臟及鰓，洗淨。

sentences.english: Most species have paired fins and skin covered with either bony or tooth-like scales.
sentences.chinese: 多數的魚都有一對鰭和覆蓋在皮膚上的鱗。

sentences.english: They have scales like those on dragons.
What he means by very short is molecular-length scales.
sentences.chinese: 他說的很短的距離是指分子長度的鱗。

sentences.english: How could I ever be happy without them?
sentences.chinese: 沒有了閃光鱗，還怎麼能獲得幸福呢？

definition: to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch
comb/to comb/to weed out/to eliminate/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
bit (of a bridle)/to hold in the mouth/to harbor (feelings)/to link/to accept/rank/title
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
